markdown:
| icon           = poe2 gaensvef_berries icon.png
| description    = These strange berries have a delicate, feathered surface. They are used in the production of Svef, a powerful, hallucinogenic drug. Though originally grown in distant Tal Kness, Gaensvef plants have been transplanted and cultivated in the Deadfire, where the alternating wet and dry seasons provide ideal growing conditions. While the Tal Kness variant of Gaensvef is a thin, frail plant, those found growing wild throughout the archipelago are quite hardy.
| added_in       = poe2
| equipment_slot = Unequippable
| item_type      = Plant
| item_category  = Ingredient
| requirements   = 
| is_soulbound   = no
| is_unique      = no
| value          = 25
| shop_value     = 125
| range          =

| level2_spells  =

| internalname   = Plant_Gaensvef_berries
| location       = * [The Gullet](/theGullet/), [Delver's Row](/delversRow/): Sold by [Enarat](/enarat/).
* [Periki's Overlook](/perikisOverlook/): Sold by [Cuitztli](/cuitztli/) in [Cuitztli's Exotic Herbs](/cuitztlisExoticHerbs/).
* [Ori o Koīki](/oriOKoiki/): Sold by [Kipeha](/kipeha/).
* [Periki's Overlook](/perikisOverlook/): 6 can be picked from the garden surrounding the [Watershapers Guild](/watershapersGuild/).
| guid           =e36f6414-88cc-43bb-ba7d-c62cad8b03c8
}}
